XSugar API Specification

This document is the API specification for the XSugar package.

See:
          Description

Packages
dk.brics.xsugar Main interface to the XSugar package.
dk.brics.xsugar.reversibility Reversibility analyzer for XSugar stylesheets.
dk.brics.xsugar.stylesheet Representation of XSugar stylesheets.
dk.brics.xsugar.validator XML validator for XSugar stylesheets.
dk.brics.xsugar.xml XML normalization for XSugar stylesheets and input/output.

 

This document is the API specification for the XSugar package.

For more information about XSugar, see the project home page: http://www.brics.dk/xsugar/

Author:
Anders Møller <amoeller@brics.dk>, Claus Brabrand <brabrand@brics.dk>
